data.md:MetaData: Raw data from 26 XCTD probes launched during the AO2018 (MOCCHA) expedition on the IB Oden

26 XCTD probes were launched during the AO2018 (MOCCHA) cruise to the North Pole on the swedish icebreaker Oden (01 Aug - 22 Sep 2018). The raw data have been converted to ASCII files using the MK150 software. No further processing was applied.
